name: BMO Short-Term US TIPS Index ETF
longDescription: The ETF seeks to replicate, to the extent possible, the performance of a U.S. government inflation-linked bond index, net of expenses. Currently, the ETF seeks to replicate the performance of the Bloomberg Barclays US Government Inflation-Linked 0-5 Year Bond Index. The investment strategy of the ETF is to invest in and hold the constituent securities of the Index in the same proportion as they are reflected in the Index. The Manager may also use a sampling methodology in selecting investments for the ETF to obtain exposure to the performance of the Index.

fullAddress: 43rd Floor, 100 King Street West, Toronto, ON, CA
